name: the-seekers-guide-to-the-sunward-isles
title: The Seeker's Guide to the Sunward Isles
description:
A century has passed since Ban'Fe Lan rode the headwinds of a sunstorm back into port in a sloop with diamond sails. She and her eight crewmen told stories of mystical isles with riches beyond imagining. She would lead them back there, for a price and a pardon. 

The Dynasty branded her a liar and sentenced her to death.

And so the first soul to ever return from the sunward sea found her death back in port. Drowned in the central square of a minor city and offered to the Etoi for judgment.

But her eight crew survived her, and within that year the Sunward March had begun. 

Today we've still not reached its goal. The land where the dragon herself hangs white and brilliant in the center of the sky. Yet many riches have been found, discoveries made, and legends born - by those who Seek the Prime Solar.
author: Blake E. Bennett
